name: Macbeth! Macbeth!
description:
Macbeth! Macbeth! Is a game made in Inky. You are MACBETH! Or rather, an actor who is playing Macbeth in your local acting troupe's production of Macbeth. Unfortunately for you (maybe not for your fellow actors), you're late!

Made for my Interactive Storytelling in Games class, with

Jason Lee - "Haunted" Branch,

Matt Quinn - "Embarrassed" Branch,

I wrote the "Selfish" Branch.

A few possible endings:

See a ghost! (Haunted)

Bees! (Selfish)

Fight back your nausea! (Embarrassed)
